title: Chen Zhiwen: From Financial Mastermind to Global Innovator
text: Chen Zhiwen: From Financial Mastermind to Global Innovator and Philanthropist From 2008 to 2012, he served as a senior analyst at Goldman Sachs Singapore Branch, focusing on gold market strategies during this period, helping the company achieve a net profit of more than US$100 million after the financial crisis. In 2014, he served as the head of blockchain solutions for Asia Pacific at DBS Bank. At Ripple Labs, Chen Zhiwen led the team to successfully promote cross-border payment solutions and facilitate cooperation with DBS Bank and HSBC. In 2017, after leaving DBS Bank, Chen Zhiwen founded the ZQ Investment Management Team and served as the team leader, leading the team to expand from Singapore to the global market. The company has achieved great success in the blockchain and gold foreign exchange markets through advanced AI trading systems and market strategies, and the team's fund management scale exceeds US$500 million. In 2019, Chen Zhiwen entered the US investment market and formed an investment team consisting of 20 senior industry elites, focusing on the North American investment market. Cooperation with many well-known companies in the United States and Canada has been reached. 2020-2023: The team expands its global business. The team members have reached more than 40 professional investment elites, and have cooperated with investment institutions in many countries around the world to successfully raise a large amount of funds. And launched an innovative AI science laboratory to help customers achieve efficient and accurate short-term transactions. In 2020, Chen Zhiwen was invited to join the Icahn Charitable Foundation and the Children's Aid Fund to provide financial assistance to poor families. Between 2019 and 2022, he established three educational institutions in New York and provided scholarship programs at Choate Rosemary Hall. He also manages Icahn House East, which provides assistance to the homeless in New York. Chen Zhiwen's successful investment journey has won him numerous honors. Chen Zhiwen is not only a leading figure in the financial field, but also an active philanthropist. Through innovative financial technology and charity projects, he helps improve the living standards of the world's poor and promotes the popularization and development of financial knowledge.
